overview:
Full Stack Developer with 6 years of experience in designing and building web and mobile applications.
Blockchain Developer with 3 years of experience in smart contract and web3 development.
Especially dedicated in complex back-end development including web-scraping, OpenAI, Chatbot, streaming, webRTC, CI/CD, etc.
Have high Problem-solving skills, good communication skills, fast learning ability.
Be proficient in several programming languages and cloud, such as Google, AWS.

description: Developed chess project using Angular and AWS lambda functions. Modify payment method to crypto one using blockchain.
Created and launched 4 decentralised ICO applications using Ethereum and ReactJS and Web3 modal for 3 cryptocurrency startups.
Worked with the team to implement a decentralised energy trading platform on the Ethereum blockchain using Solidity smart contracts and Golang, facilitating over $200,000 worth of trades.
Developed trading site that users share trading strategy and give them feedback using ChatGPT, OpenAI, React, and AWS.
Developed TRUE market using Next.js and Nest.js.
Developed voice call web application through deepgram service using python, Next.js, tailwind css, and turbo.
Developed a frontend for decentralized data storage using Next.js, Tailwind CSS and Turbo.
Developed a WordPress plugin for wallet integration.
Developed dashboard template project using tailwind css and next.js framework.
Developed frontend for betting site using React.
Developed backend for automatic generation telegram bot using telethon, appium, selenium and Google cloud.
Developed frontend demo project using react and tailwind css.
Master web scraping using puppeteer, selenium, beautifulsoup, scrapingbee and zenrows.
Developed telegram bot as friend in life, including voice feature.
